channel.title: Every step!
channel.description:
hello guys.
im trying to make a server end i did every single step.
download jdk opening the port classpath en path stuff everyything everything. when i compile i dont got problems it says oke end when i run it says ....scape is online. but when i want to connect it dont connects!!@!@!! Guys pleas help me.

item.title: Every step!
item.dc:creator: @bigbigbigbigboyboy56 bigbigbigbigboyboy56
item.description:
@bigbigbigbigboyboy56 wrote:

i have the same problem!

Read full topic

item.title: Every step!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

imsokool22:

AND you obviously don’t know what they are either man because if you read a tut on making a server you need both of them open because some don’t go through for coming it is udp and sending it out is tcp if u just open 1 it wouldn’t work try it i wanna see it FAIL!

TCP: Transmission control protocol, connection-based, packets arrive in the order they were sent.
UDP: User datagram protocol, not connection-based, packets may or may not arrive in the order they were sent.

I searched for ‘DatagramSocket’ in the server files, and guess what? No hits. That is because private servers do not use UDP in any way.

Read full topic

item.title: Every step!
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Lol. UDP is a one way ticket. A server needs to send and reveive data, therefor it relies on TCP…

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“ollie123, post:14, topic:323066”][quote author=imsokool22 link=topic=419470.msg3083759#msg3083759 date=1262365324]
LOL ITS FOR A RUNESCAPE SERVER DUMB ASS… NOT RUNESCAPE THE REAL GAME
[/quote]

You really are an idiot, aren’t you?

The RuneScape Protocol operates over TCP, and guess what, PRIVATE SERVERS USE THE RUNESCAPE PROTOCOL TO COMMUNICATE WITH THE CLIENT![/quote]
I wish i could give you rep++ there lol but i can’t i need 2 more reps to get 15.

item.title: Every step!
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

imsokool22:

LOL ITS FOR A RUNESCAPE SERVER DUMB ASS… NOT RUNESCAPE THE REAL GAME

You really are an idiot, aren’t you?

The RuneScape Protocol operates over TCP, and guess what, PRIVATE SERVERS USE THE RUNESCAPE PROTOCOL TO COMMUNICATE WITH THE CLIENT, hence RuneScape private server. Anyway, if you looked in the Server class, you would find that the Server listens on a ServerSocket, not a DatagramSocket.

Read full topic

item.title: Every step!
item.dc:creator: @g_izzy g_izzy
item.description:
@g_izzy wrote:

[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:2, topic:323066”]Have you done the no-ip step?

And have you added an exception in your firewall?
If not open your firewall then go to the tab “Exceptions”
Then add a port and type “43594” on the port and choose “TCP”
Then press “ok” after that add another port which is still the port “43594”
But this time do UDP instead of tcp, so now you have both TCP & UDP.
Close everything up and try again! Now you have added exceptions in your firewall![/quote]hey man i did that to i did no-ip to everything.
people cant connect to me i think it has something to do with ports.
when i dont fill anything in server at the silab client i connect to my own server.
i dont know what to do.
can u maybe fix it for me via teamviewer?

Read full topic

item.title: Every step!
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Have you done the no-ip step?

And have you added an exception in your firewall?
If not open your firewall then go to the tab “Exceptions”
Then add a port and type “43594” on the port and choose “TCP”
Then press “ok” after that add another port which is still the port “43594”
But this time do UDP instead of tcp, so now you have both TCP & UDP.
Close everything up and try again! Now you have added exceptions in your firewall!

Read full topic
